pages.title: Herbalist Hut
pages.text: A secluded workshop found in $(bold)Swamp$() and $(bold)Mangrove Swamp$() biomes. An early source of herbs, crops, and farming materials for aspiring witches.

pages.title: Where to Find
pages.text: Look for a small, weathered cabin partially hidden by vegetation. Inside, you'll often find a $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#shelf)Shelf$(/l) or two and a brewing setup; outside, tilled plots on $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#infused_dirt)Infused Dirt$(/l).

pages.title: At a Glance
pages.text: $(li)Rustic wooden cabin; mossy floors and overgrowth.$(br)$(li)Plots of $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#infused_dirt)Infused Dirt$(/l) with herbs or crops.$(br)$(li)Small storage for brews and reagents.

pages.title: Loot & Resources
pages.text: $(li)$(l:hexalia:resources/herbs)Core Herbs$(/l) and rare flora.$(br)$(li)$(l:hexalia:resources/crops)Wild Crops$(/l) for seed starts.$(br)$(li)Infused soils for sustainable herb farming.$(br)Tip: Bone meal on herbs planted in Infused Dirt can duplicate them.

pages.title: Why It Matters
pages.text: A single hut can jump-start your progression: gather herbs for $(l:hexalia:content/brews)brews$(/l), set up plots with $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#infused_farmland)Infused Farmland$(/l), and stock a $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#shelf)Shelf$(/l) to prep for early rituals.
